commits.comment: [KARAF-615] Create Cellar subproject
[617] Cellar now uses Hazelcast
[KARAF-615] Fixed wrong artifact id for cellar cfg artifacts.
Add .gitignore.
[KARAF-618] Align Cellar major version with the Karaf one [KARAF-620] Use Karaf parent POM Start to cleanup java to apply Apache checkstyle convention.
[KARAF-620] Cellar use the parent Karaf POM. [KARAF-618] Align Cellar major (and only major) with the Karaf one.
Apply Apache checkstyle convertion in all file. Fix some type mistakes.
Fix the Karaf features version in Cellar features descriptor.
Fix OSGi package statements.
[KARAF-631] Removed properties that hide each other. Changed uses of keySet to entrySet. Fixed handling of handler names.
Applied some findBugs and PMD hints. Also refactored some of the packages to match the existing package naming scheme.
[KARAF-640] Added configuration file, which contains hazelcast instance configuration (mutlicast,tcpip etc). Added a factory for creating Hazelcast service configuration.
[KARAF-640] Removed HazelcastConfigurationFactory, which is now obsolete.
[KARAF-649] Use maven-enforcer-plugin.
[KARAF-652] HazelcastServiceFactory now checks for null value the properties passed for building an instance. The test now properly initializes the factory.
[KARAF-628] Added cellar event,synchronizer,listener and handler for replicating bundle states
[KARAF-628] Bundle listener is now properly registered. Hazelcast module now dynamically imports karaf/cellar packages, so that the user can unistall parts of cellar.
[KARAF-616] Added a webconsole plugin for Cellar. Added Group and Node listing to the webconsole plugin. Added the abilitiy to create groups via webconsole.
Fix features descriptor and style
[KARAF-674] Fix Karaf version used in Cellar.
Prepare Cellar POM for the release.
Add Cellar documentation layout.
[KARAF-619] Starting the Cellar documentation.
[KARAF-619] Resume the Cellar documentation.
[KARAF-619] Append user guide in the Cellar manual.
[KARAF-619] Add Cellar architecture documentation.
Add Apache Karaf Cellar release files.
[KARAF-692] HazelcastServiceFactoryTest stuck waiting the second node.
[KARAF-616] Added missing javascript files.
[KARAF-701] Add Cellar source distribution and refactoring of the features artifact.
[KARAF-701] Fix groups, node, and instance artifacts.
[KARAF-703] Include correct NOTICE file in Cellar artifacts.
[KARAF-714] Cellar features descriptor is not correct.
[KARAF-715] Remove Karaf logo from the Cellar manual.
[KARAF-716] Fix broken links on Cellar user and architecture guides.
[KARAF-724] cluster:config-propset value argument is not correctly named.
Update the manual upload directory.
[KARAF-732] Fixes to Cellar architecture guide and Cellar user's guide.
Fix type mistake in under guide.

[KARAF-642] Create an interface for DiscoveryServices. Added a module that provides a cloud discovery service (using blobstore blackboard pattern). Added a recurring task that uses available discovery services to update the tcp/ip member list.
[KARAF-642] Added a section in the manual that describes cloud discovery.
[KARAF-763] Editorial fixes to Cellar documentation.
[KARAF-761] Update cloud discovery documentation
[KARAF-721] Add Cellar logging statements and source cleanup.
[KARAF-723] Start the JMX structure for Cellar MBean and JMX support.
[KARAF-777] Extend Karaf version range support.
[KARAF-723] Add new MBeans in Karaf Cellar.
[KARAF-723] Remove the local attribute in the Cellar node MBean.
[KARAF-723] Fix issues with codec classes.
[KARAF-723] Complete the Cellar MBeans with the config support.
[KARAF-723] Add Cellar core MBean to manipulate handler, consumer and producer.
[KARAF-801] Update Cellar NOTICE file to mention jclouds.
[KARAF-723] Cleanup Cellar group MBean.
[KARAF-804] Fix "Start Karaf Cellar" link
[KARAF-807] Add a name to the cellar features.xml
Fixed a typo inside the cellar bundle event handler.
[KARAF-821] Added exception handling and logging on local bundle listener when uninstalling cellar.
[KARAF-825] EventHandlerServiceRegistry now uses reference-listeners instead of looking up all EventHandlers for each invocation.
Fix mistakes in BUILDING and README files
[KARAF-830] Splitted cellar feature into cellar and cellar-core features. This is done so that the feature can be resolved by the ObrResolver, which otherwise fails due to service dependencies.
[KARAF-830] Rolled back previous change. Added export service headers for cellar hazelcast module.
[KARAF-831] Added cluster:group-pick command. Also added output suppression support for all group commands. This is really useful for command composition.
[KARAF-823] Added a basic implementation of remote services (dosgi).
[KARAF-823] Added a event transport factory class.
[KARAF-823] Added NOTICE file.
[KARAF-823] Added HazelcastEventTransportFactory, QueueConsumer, QueueProducer and QueueConsumeTask.
[KARAF-837] Added samples. Added dosgi-greeter sample. Added hazelcast-app sample.
[KARAF-837] Added missing files.
[KARAF-837] Fixed some typos in the hazelcast sample README .
[KARAF-837] Removed @author tags from samples.
[KARAF-837] Fixed some spelling/syntax errors .
[KARAF-823] Added feature dosgi bundle in the cellar feature.
[KARAF-841] Cellar commands are now available using Equinox
[KARAF-839] Fix a NPE raised when pinging an unknown node.
[KARAF-839] Add style enhancements for clearer code.
[KARAF-843] ImportServiceListener, ExportServiceListener and GroupManager now properly cache consumers & producers and properly remove them when no longer needed"
[KARAF-844] Removed the global dynamic import on karaf packages and replaced it with dynamic imports per cellar module.
[KARAF-844] Removed all karaf related dynamic imports from cellar.
[KARAF-844] Fixed karaf.version property.

[KARAF-842] Added a combined class loader which delegates class loading to bundles that have registered themselves to the class loader. Added a bundle listener that register/unregisters bundles that import hazelcast or cellar packages to the comined class loader.
[KARAF-823] ExportServiceListener now properly updates the set of nodes that export each service class.
[KARAF-823] Added a shell command which lists the distributed services and the nodes that export each service.
[KARAF-851] Upgrade and cleanup Maven plugins
[KARAF-851] Update and cleanup Maven plugins version
Cleanup Cellar POM (checkstyle) and check the dynamic imports.
[KARAF-842] Converted LinkedHashMap to ConcurrentHashMap in Cellars combined class loader.
[KARAF-856] Cellar discovery task now uses a new property for storing the discovered member IPs. Added some checks for avoiding overwrites on the properties used for unicast discovery.
Apply checkstyle, cleanup and minor fix on the DOSGi module.
[KARAF-857] Begin Cellar OBR support.
[KARAF-862] Upgrade to Hazelcast 1.9.4
[KARAF-857] Fix OBR import packages.
[KARAF-857] Move the blueprint descriptors in the right location.
[KARAF-857] Begin of the OBR URL support.
[KARAF-857] Complete the cluster OBR commands.
[KARAF-857] Fix OBR URL and deploy commands.
[KARAF-857] Complete the OBR support by maintaining a bundle distributed set.
[KARAF-857] Add the OBR command support.
[KARAF-857] Update the Cellar manual with the OBR support.
[KARAF-857] Add a synchronizer on the OBR URL.
[KARAF-857] Cleanup logging message with consistent severity.
[KARAF-857] Fix the OBR handler name.
[KARAF-865] Set HazelcastBundleListener as a SynchronousBundleListener
[KARAF-863] Rename Cellar commands for consistency
[KARAF-863] Cleanup Cellar commands description
[KARAF-877] Typo fixes on the Cellar OBR support documentation
[KARAF-877] Typo fix on the Cellar OBR support documentation
[KARAF-887] Reference PrinceXML in the Karaf Cellar manual
[KARAF-819] Use full qualified feature name in Cellar
[KARAF-859] Added support for feature repository removal from cellar.
[KARAF-949] Upgraded to jclouds 1.1.1.
[KARAF-943] Inject groupManager in the UninstallFeatureCommand to avoid NPE
[ KARAF-1011] Replaced springdm with blueprint in cellar-hazelcast.
Changing feature names back to the old style, since the fqn style is not going to be adopted.
[KARAF-1011] Removed springdm from dependency management.
[KARAF-1012] Updated jclouds to 1.2.1 and jclouds-karaf to 1.2.1_1.
[KARAF-1012] Replaced jclouds.version with jclouds.karaf.version for jclouds feature.
Improved shell completion support for cellar group commands.
[KARAF-1011] Fixed a bug that prevented the cellar instance to be propely initialized after restarts.
Cellar should avoid synching karaf core configuration, by default.
[KARAF-850] Cellar now uses hazelcast.xml under etc folder to provide default Hazelcast configuration. Group and Network configuration are overrided by the configuration Admin.
[KARAF-1026] Added integration tests for installation, multiple instances and basic group actions.
[KARAF-1026] Added integration test for cellar features synchronization and commands.
[KARAF-1026] Uninstall cellar feature before destroying child instances.
Fix the Cellar features name
[KARAF-1076] Fixed issue with group configurations and whitespaces. Added unit tests that checks this case.

[KARAF-1079] Fixed Hazlecast configuration manager to properly create sets from configuration properties. Added a unit tests that checks the isUpdated method of the configuratio manager. Added missing license headers.
[KARAF-1034] Fixed destroy methods so that cellar can cleanly uninstall. Added some lifecycle and npe checks.
[KARAF-1026] Added dosgi integration test. Enhanced operations such as create child, execute command etc. Removed obsolete cluster setup calls. Added missing license headers.
[KARAF-1081] Added a merge policy for cellar. The merge policy will merge string (comma separated & specially tagged), sets, list and multinode entries.
[KARAF-1081] Reuse CellarUtils inside HazelcastConfigurationManager.
[KARAF-1082] HazelcastGroupManager now properlly syncs the group configuration from hazelcast to config admin and vice versa.
[KARAF-1034] Caught an exception that occurs when uninstalling and added a warning message.
[KARAF-1083] Blacklisted pax-logging from default cellar sync.
[KARAF-1082] Added a unit test for the Hazlecast configuration manager that tests isUpdated method. Also removed tests that now belong to CellarUtilsTest.
[KARAF-1081] Refactored Group to implement MultiNode interface used by the merge policy.
[KARAF-1026] Fixed the dosgi itest to test 1 and 2 service nodes and also assert loadbalancing is correct.
[KARAF-1084] Added a simple camel-hazelcast application sample to cellar. Added an integrationt test based on that sample.
Checkstyle fix on the Cellar itests POM
[KARAF-823] Cellar will import remote services, even if they are not present at the time of the listener registration.
[KARAF-1026] Upgraded to Karaf 2.2.5 for the integration tests. Added integration test for cellar configuration sync.
Add a missing NOTICE file in a sample

Fix Hazelcast configuration manager unit test failure
